author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/valorant/

Members of the VALORANT maps team share a behind-the-scenes look at how they approached designing Corrode, VAL’s latest map—chock full of defensive options, easter eggs, story spaces, and all-around gorgeous views.

Learn how the team took inspiration from the last 5 years of VAL to elevate art and gameplay to the next level of VALORANT map design.

Game Designer: Diego Varona
Concept Artist: Michael Shinde
3D Artist: Tobias Koepp

#ps5 #ps5games #valorant
title: Valorant - Dev Diaries: Behind the Walls of Corrode | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
The Future Icons Event is now in session! Rise to top of the class in the new 1v1 LTM Arenas: Duels, study new updates to Wattson and Vantage—there's also an opportunity to get the new Jocks vs. Preps Legendary Skins, plus Wattson’s “Apex Icon” Prestige Skin during the event. For extra credit, ace the Reward Track for Epic Skins, and more.

Apex Legends™ is a free-to-play* battle royale game where legendary characters battle for glory, fame, and fortune on the fringes of the Frontier. Play for free now on PlayStation® 4, PlayStation 5.

Credits:
Production Company: Electronic Arts & Dark Burn Creative
Sound Design and Mix: Respawn Entertainment & Mass Audio
All other categories: Electronic Arts & Respawn Entertainment

*Applicable platform account and platform subscription (sold separately) may be required. Persistent internet connection and EA account required. Age restrictions apply. This game includes optional in-game purchases of virtual currency that can be used to acquire virtua
title: Apex Legends - Future Icons Event Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
Pre-order now: https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/sonic-racing-crossworlds/

Rev up those fryers and engines! SpongeBob SquarePants and Patrick Star join the cast of Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds! Race through the Bikini Bottom course, visit the Krusty Krab, and tear up the ocean floor in the Patty Wagon. 

Upgrade to the Digital Deluxe Edition to access Season Pass content including SpongeBob SquarePants!

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games #sonicracingcrossworlds
title: Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds - Kids Choice Awards Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games
